title: The 20 Minute LPQ
body:
So...

Probably half of the population of League players should be up to this point.
And I was wondering, if Riot could have the same ban system as Valve - CS:GO.

The CS:GO system may have it's flaws, but there are some positives:

1) Having the ban time minimised after a long time of no breach.
2) The Norms / Bots are not effected by the timer, only the Ranked is.
3) People still get to practice actively through Norms.

But then again there are some negatives:

1) The players could (after the time is minimised), more frequently troll.
2) Norms, where people practice their new champs without having to lose LP, they could be trolled
3) People are more effected by this new system.

Please Riot do consider this, I do do the 20 minute LPQ and I cannot defend myself to due my inactive breaches.
But do please consider this.

TLDR: Minimise the LPQ timer, not entirely, but over time. So 20 becomes 15 after 2 weeks of good behaviour and no reports and so on.

replies.body: Or just don't be deserving of a LPQ in the first place. Quite simple really...
